(I got ten minutes to post, literally, so this'll probably be loaded with 
typos, etc. just wanna apologize in advance! Hmm, Yan a commi... I could 
totally see that happening^_^ I'll post RIon tomorrow! LONG LIVE THE 
MAXIMALS!)

Tavatron/Hysteria(reactivated)

Tavatron ran across the plains as quickly as her legs would carry her. In 
one fluid motion she jumped, transformed, and drew her staff. She landed 
about ten feet from Iron Raptor, just as Nemisis Enforcer gave the order to 
kill her. Tavatron fired several optic blasts as she tried to intercept the 
remainder of his shots. She then fired one solid blast at Nemisis Enforcer's 
torso.

*****

Hysteria charged her rifle and ran through the new 'exit' provided by one of 
the Alliance 'bots. She raised her rifle and fired two plasma energy bolts 
at Obliteratron before restoring it to cyber space and replacing it with her 
arm/shoulder cannons.

>
>Nemesis Enforcer yelled to Scattershot via comm. transmission.  "IRON 
>RAPTOR
>IS IN THE BATTLE!  KILL HER!" He activated the boosters in his feet and 
>held
>his wings aloft, keeping his arms akimbo with the rapid firing-laser rifle.
>
>He flew at Iron Raptor, firing off ten rapid laser blasts at her torso.
